title: Noam Chomsky: on the Pandemic, Ukraine crisis & Climate Change
description:
This interview with Noam Chomsky was recorded on the 10th of January 2022 using Riverside.fm. 

We are very happy in using Riverside.fm to record our online interviews. You can meet and record for videos, podcasts, social media and more, and it's easy and fun to use.
